de.erichseifert.gral.graphics

Interface Layout

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EdgeLayout, OuterEdgeLayout, StackedLayout, TableLayout

    public interface Layout
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface that provides basic functions for arranging a layout. Functionality includes the arrangement of components and returning the preferred size of a specified container using this layout.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.geom.Dimension2D getPreferredSize(Container container)
      Returns the preferred size of the specified container using this layout.
      void layout(Container container)
      Arranges the components of the specified container according to this layout.

    • Method Detail

      • layout

        void layout(Container container)
        Arranges the components of the specified container according to this layout.
        Parameters:
        container - Container to be laid out.

      • getPreferredSize

        java.awt.geom.Dimension2D getPreferredSize(Container container)
        Returns the preferred size of the specified container using this layout.
        Parameters:
        container - Container whose preferred size is to be returned.
        Returns:
        Preferred extent of the specified container.
